content.content: General Updates Wild week for MakerDAO in the Core Units department.  Know Your MIP:  We’re preparing the next KYM. Stay tuned!   Collateral Onboarding:  Nothing for now. Let us know if you have a project to present!    Core Units Updates: Calls Coming up  Core Unit Launch Pod Session: MarkComms with @kathleen - TBD Core Unit Launch Pod Session: Oracles with @nikkunkel  - soon™ Core Unit Launch Pod Session: Collateral Onboarding with @monkey.irish  - TBD Core Unit Launch Pod Session: Governance Alpha with @prose11  - TBD  Follow live developments of Core Units on  coreunit.makerdao.network  Past Calls  Core Unit Rituals #1: OKRs for Core Units Recording   More workshops coming soon.  Core Units in Formal Submission   Strategic Marcomms Core Unit @kathleen   Sustainable Ecosystem Scaling Core Unit @juanjuan, @wouter    New Core Units in RFC   Oracles Core Unit @nik   Collateral Onboarding Core Unit @monkey.irish   Strategic Happiness Core Unit @aburban90   New GovAlpha Facilitator! @prose11  New Budgets for Risk, GovAlpha, and SES   Interesting Posts   Help us identify Risk and Opportunities - by SES  MKR Compensation Guidelines - MIP53 - by @PlanetX   An alternative MKR Compensation Plan - by SES   Signed @amyjung @juanjuan That’s all for us
This topic was automatically closed 14 days after the last reply. New replies are no longer allowed.
